name: ZIM - JavaScript Canvas Framework
description:
The official NFT for ZIM at https://zimjs.com - code creativity!

The NFT starts with the iconic ZIM... icon wearing a flared stem of ZIM colors.  The icon twirls to the corner as interactive NFT letters animate into view. Grab them and twang-toggle receding rectangles! Meanwhile, a 6000 character scrolling message from Founder, Dr Abstract, details the state of ZIM with its many conveniences, components and controls to help everyone from absolute beginner to absolute professional, left and right brained learners code Gen Art, Game Zaps, Logo Play, Ad Muse, Data Vis, UI/UX, Learn Apps, Escape Puzzles, Info Actives, Wonder Cards and more!

ZIM NFT, born from ONE, DUO, TRI, 4TH, VEE, SIX, HEP, OCT, NIO, TEN, CAT and powered by CreateJS, is captured in crypto on the Interplanetary File System.  It is at once a magnificent collectible and a prototype for making NFTs with the framework.  

See https://zimjs.com/nft for a guide to making ZIM NFTs.
